text: it looks like none of HubSpot’s membership modules are actually showing in their default modules folder in the design manager - perhaps they intentionally wanted to restrict access to it, in which case you wouldn’t be able to do anything with it, other than style what’s there. this is a weird one…
Can we import a JSON file into a module? I need to share the same data in two modules.

Hey everyone,
I’m building a simple CTA module and want a boolean option available to add spacing if theres 2 CTA’s next to eachother.
```<a class="cta {{ module.cta_color }}" style="margin-right: {{cta_spacing is truthy ? "100px" : " "}}"  href="#" >{{ module.cta_text }}</a>```
Is there any obvious reason why this in-line style logic isn’t working for me?
